function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of emphasis on health and safety in architectural space design","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease propagation within built environments","Mitigation":"Incorporate health and safety guidelines into architectural design principles","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, antimicrobial materials, and touchless technologies","People":"Occupants of built environments, particularly in densely populated areas","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and building developers"},{"Description":"Lack of user participation in decision-making regarding housing issues","Impact":"Potential for inadequate housing conditions and increased risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Implement community engagement strategies to involve users in decision-making","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, digital feedback tools, and participatory design software","People":"Residents and community members affected by housing conditions","Owner":"Local government, housing organizations, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Inadequate infrastructure for healthy living spaces","Impact":"Compromised living conditions and heightened risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Invest in infrastructure for quality and healthy living spaces, prioritize basic sanitation and hygiene facilities","Technologies":"Smart infrastructure systems, sustainable construction materials, and efficient waste management technologies","People":"Residential occupants in need of quality housing and living environments","Owner":"Government agencies, housing authorities, and property developers"}]}
